snippet.title: Fragment Trailer 2024
snippet.description:
It's been a few years but the updated trailer for Fragment, the first game from Snail's Pace, is here! Fragment is a game made in RPG Maker 2003 where you play as a blank little animal guy wandering through a strange world that belongs to your creator. 

You can play the demo now on Itch.io!
https://snailspace.itch.io/fragment-demo-version
